personal.name: Durgaraj Chauhan
personal.title: Senior Software Engineer & GenAI Engineer
personal.bio: Senior Software Engineer and Full-Stack AI Engineer specializing in production-ready AI systems, RAG pipelines, agentic AI, and modern full-stack development.
personal.tagline: Building Intelligent, Scalable AI Solutions That Matter

responsibilities: Led development of production-grade AI chatbots and callbots with real-time voice interaction
Implemented context-aware LLM pipelines with RAG-based knowledge grounding
Automated workflows achieving 60% efficiency gains across operations
Built VLM-based document processing systems for enterprise clients
Designed scalable microservices architecture with Docker and AWS
Developed high-performance APIs using FastAPI and Laravel
achievements: Reduced AI response latency by 40% through optimization
Deployed multi-tenant RAG systems serving 10,000+ queries/day
Led team in transitioning legacy systems to AI-powered solutions

responsibilities: Delivered full-stack applications using Laravel, PHP, and React
Implemented computer vision projects for automated quality control
Integrated payment gateways (Stripe, Razorpay) for e-commerce platforms
Built secure authentication systems with JWT and OAuth
Developed responsive frontends with modern React patterns
Collaborated with design team on UX improvements
achievements: Earned 3x Employee of the Month awards
Reduced page load times by 50% through optimization
Successfully delivered 10+ client projects on time

projects.name: AI Callbot System
projects.tagline: Production-grade voice AI system with real-time interaction
projects.description: Built a production-ready AI Callbot featuring real-time voice interaction, RAG-based knowledge grounding, and scalable cloud deployment. System handles 1000+ concurrent calls with sub-2gs latency.
challenges: Achieving sub-2s response latency for voice interactions

projects.name: Insurance Damage Estimation Platform
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered platform for automated vehicle damage estimation using Vision-Language Models. System processes images and generates detailed damage reports with cost estimates.
challenges: Handling varying image quality and lighting
Training models for accurate damage classification

projects.name: Enterprise CMS Solution
projects.description: Built a comprehensive enterprise CMS with role-based access control, workflow automation, and multi-tenant architecture. Supports 50,000+ content pieces with search and analytics.

projects.name: RAG Knowledge Base System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a high-performance RAG system for enterprise knowledge management. Features hybrid search, re-ranking, and adaptive chunking strategies.

highlights: Specialized in Machine Learning and AI
State Level Runner-up in Technical Quiz
